EmailTemplate.description: ODS Super User, Subcriptions, WSF, Shredding Customer
EmailTemplate.name: Hilton BirchStreet Super User Subscriptions, WSF, Shredding_Customer
EmailTemplate.subject: Office Depot Business Account {!Account.Cust_ID__c}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName}!
I am following up on my call. Please let me know when you are available to talk about important updates to your Office Depot Business Account, {!Account.Cust_ID__c}.
Office Depot is not only for your office supplies, but also for your F&B disposables, housekeeping, cleaning, janitorial, break-room, and facilities products. Shop Best Value! https://business.officedepot.com/
Hilton Supply Management BirchStreet Training Videos
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLPso9raA21drixUEQpjj0bJ79_oXZ65Ig
Visit: https://business.officedepot.com/
Login ID:
Temporary Password: Welcome1
Administrative rights allow you to:
Manager User Profiles: Add, edit or modify users Account Management to Add or Edit: Contacts, Shipping Addresses, Desktop Locations and Accounting Fields. Approval Process: Set up simple or multi level/tiered approvals. Company-Wide Shopping Lists: Create and Modify account wide shared shopping lists. Online Reporting: Access billing and reporting and control user ability to access report and billing solutions. Bill management allows for you to view individual invoices and to pay invoices on-line. Allow for Pop Ups when utilizing Bill Management.
The homepage displays a Bulletin Board that you can use to communicate with others that log into your business account. Your company's logo can be displayed on the Bulletin Board and messages can be updated as often as necessary.
Online Reporting, Bill Management allows for you to view individual invoices and to pay invoices on-line. Allow for Pop Ups when utilizing Bill Management.
For billing questions, credit card payment or to obtain a copy of your invoice contact our Office Depot Billing Department at 1-800-721-6592, opt 3, email INV-PODS@OfficeDepot.com.
Our Procurement Registration and/or In-Store, Store Purchasing Card (Mobile SPC) Program allow you to receive the in-store price or your business-discounted pricing (whichever is lower), including copy & print discounts, when you shop at any of our retail locations.
Clorox Total 360 System - Special Order
https://www.cloroxprofessional.com/products/clorox-total-360-system/at-a-glance/
Office Depot® The best of everything from coffee to candy, cutlery to cleaning supplies!
https://view.publitas.com/office-depot-digital/breakroom-solutions/page/1
Work Space Facilities Catalog SKU# 231004 https://view.publitas.com/office-depot-digital/workspace_facilities/page/1
Save Time with Subscriptions https://business.officedepot.com/cm/marketing/subscriptions/?hijack=subcription&type=Search
It’s convenient -- subscribing makes the ordering process easier, and frees up your valuable time. You only have to set it up once, create a delivery schedule that suits your requirements -- no need to log back in again! You will never run out of those items that you use consistently. A reminder email will be sent seven days before each delivery. If needed, you can change or cancel your subscription at any time.
Shredding Services: Let us help you shred, store and secure what matters most! Flexible options are available for your unique business.
Safe Best-in-class security Affordable Reliable Convenient pickup
Banquet - https://business.officedepot.com/catalog/search.do?Ntt=Banquet
Furniture - https://view.publitas.com/office-depot-digital/exclusive_furn/page/1
Chairs - https://view.publitas.com/office-depot-digital/furniture-solutions/page/1
Protect against Visual Hacking 3M™ Privacy Filter Screens work simply and beautifully on most of today's monitors to help protect your screens, and help keep the information displayed on them private.
https://business.officedepot.com/cm/tech/3m-filter-finder
https://www.3m.com/3M/en_US/privacy-screen-protectors-us/resources/productfinder/
Office Depot Business Resources:
Customer Service 1-800-974-3376 or 1-888-777-4044 Place Orders, handle item requests quickly, address Shipping Issues, Returns and Order Tracking requests.
Avendra Program Member(s) Customer Service 1-866-308-0806 Place Orders, handle item requests quickly, address Shipping Issues, Returns and Order Tracking requests.
Access your business account at a moment’s notice! Simply download the Office Depot Business app, log in and enjoy the benefits of mobile access to your Office Depot Business Solution Division account.
Features:
Place and track orders at your convenience Review Pending Approval orders on-the-go Scan item barcode or search using voice command to check pricing and purchase Access company-wide and personal shopping lists for easy * ordering Built with all industry-standard security practices you’ve come to expect from business.officedepot.com
Billing questions, to pay by credit card, request copies of an invoice, contact our Billing Department 1-800-721-6592, Opt 3, INVPODS@OfficeDepot.com
eBilling, Update Accounts Payable Contact: abbillingsupport@officedepot.com
Electronic Commerce Support/Web Help: 1-800-269-6888
Sincerely,
Karen Daniel
Inside Sales, Business Account Manager | Office Depot, Inc. Tel: 1-855-337-6811 Ext 12842 | karen.daniel@officedepot.com
CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: The information contained in this email and attached document(s) may contain confidential information that is intended only for the addressee(s). If you are not the intended recipient, you are hereby advised that any disclosure, copying, distribution or the taking of any action in reliance upon the information is prohibited. If you have received this email in error, please immediately notify the sender and delete it from your system.
